description: The native medium of software designs is code.

activities.name: Web Architectures
activities.description: We will go through a few common web architectures

activities.name: The Impact of Architecture on Design
activities.description: As a group, discuss how the different architectures presented will impact your designs.

activities.name: 5 Tecniques that are easy to design and hard to build
activities.instructor_notes: Semi-persistance (i.e. context dependent behavior); Apple like search results; Dashboards (what is the cost of SQL queries)...
activities.description: There are certain things that look easy on paper but can be black holes in development and usability. Here are a few of them.
